title: Rito Help Please
body: Lately my ping has been through the roof. For the last year that I've played league I ran a consistent 29-30 Ping. However since about 3 days ago my connection has gone absolutely haywire jumping to anywhere from 90-200+. I have no idea what could be causing this HELP PLZZZZZZZZ{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Input delays like this can be caused by network issues like packet loss, which can be sudden like you mentioned and result in input delays.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) of these matches to find out what's going on.  The results will also offer some troubleshooting steps specific to your case to help.  Let me know if you have any questions!
